com.al.amf.events
Class ErrorEvent

java.lang.Object
  com.al.amf.events.ResultEvent
      com.al.amf.events.ErrorEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Event
public class ErrorEvent
extends ResultEvent

Stores the error information if the remote call fails. Stores the data of an error message from the server whenever error occurs or if any runtime error occurs. The data can be retrieved by using getData method.
